This is the code for sensitivity analyses conducted on the Ring ouzel (*Turdus torquatus*) which is species 9 of this study: https://doi.org/10.1098/rstb.2022.0194


## 0) Prepare session
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = "~/Files_SwissBirds")
```

```{r}
rm(list=ls()) # reset

# packages
library(popbio)
library(tidyverse)
```

## 1) Vital rates

This part is a modified version of 2.) from the "analysis_main.R" where you compose demography-environment relationships from calibrated parameters for each species

```{r}
## a) Fecundity
loc_dens <- 1
DER_Fecund <- function(Fec0, Fc.pr1, Fc.pr2, Fc.tm1, Fc.tm2, DDp, Tbr=0, Pbr=0, Hab=100){ 
	exp(
		log(Fec0) + 
		Fc.pr1*Pbr + 
		Fc.pr2*Pbr^2 + 
		Fc.tm1*Tbr + 
		Fc.tm2*Tbr^2 ) *
	# density-dependence
	exp( - 1 * eval(loc_dens) / DDp / Hab )
}


## b) Juvenile survival
DER_juvSurv <- function(jSv0, jS.pr1, jS.pr2, jS.tm1, jS.tm2, Tat=0, Pwn=0){
	plogis(
		jS.pr1*Pwn + 
		jS.pr2*Pwn^2 + 
		jS.tm1*Tat + 
		jS.tm2*Tat^2 ,
		location = log((1-jSv0)/jSv0))
}


## c) Adult survival
DER_adSurv <- function(aSv0, aS.pr1, aS.pr2, aS.tm1, Twn=0, Pwn=0){
	plogis(
		aS.pr1*Pwn + 
		aS.pr2*Pwn^2 + 
		aS.tm1*Twn ,
		location = log((1-aSv0)/aSv0))
}

# SPECIES 9 parameters
post_sample_list=readRDS("Post_sample_list.rds")
# Juvenile survival
jSv0.sp9=post_sample_list$`Ring ouzel`$juvSurv
jS.pr1.sp9=post_sample_list$`Ring ouzel`$jSb.pr1
jS.pr2.sp9=post_sample_list$`Ring ouzel`$jSb.pr2
jS.tm1.sp9=post_sample_list$`Ring ouzel`$jSb.tm1
jS.tm2.sp9=post_sample_list$`Ring ouzel`$jSb.tm2

# Fecundity
Fec0.sp9=post_sample_list$`Ring ouzel`$Fecund
Fc.pr1.sp9=post_sample_list$`Ring ouzel`$Fcb.pr1
Fc.pr2.sp9=post_sample_list$`Ring ouzel`$Fcb.pr2
Fc.tm1.sp9=post_sample_list$`Ring ouzel`$Fcb.tm1
Fc.tm2.sp9=post_sample_list$`Ring ouzel`$Fcb.tm2
DDp.sp9=post_sample_list$`Ring ouzel`$DensDep

# Adult survival
aSv0.sp9=post_sample_list$`Ring ouzel`$adSurv
aS.pr1.sp9=post_sample_list$`Ring ouzel`$aSb.pr1
aS.pr2.sp9=post_sample_list$`Ring ouzel`$aSb.pr2
aS.tm1.sp9=post_sample_list$`Ring ouzel`$aSb.tm
```

## 2) Covariates

species-specific covariates

```{r}
cov=read.csv("TurdusCovariates.csv")

Pwn_when_Tbr_min=cov$winter_pr[which(cov$breeding_tmp==min(cov$breeding_tmp))][1]
```

## 3) Population model

Female-only, 2-staged matrix model with mean covariates

```{r}
# SPECIES 9
# mpm <- matrix(c(0,Sj,
#                fec,Sa),n.stage,n.stage)
lambda_mean_popmodel=NULL
for(u in 1:100){
  mpm <- matrix(c(0,DER_juvSurv(jSv0.sp9[u],jS.pr1.sp9[u],jS.pr2.sp9[u],jS.tm1.sp9[u],jS.tm2.sp9[u],Tat=mean.Tat,Pwn=mean.Pwn),
                DER_Fecund(Fec0.sp9[u],Fc.pr1.sp9[u],Fc.pr2.sp9[u],Fc.tm1.sp9[u],Fc.tm2.sp9[u],DDp.sp9[u],Tbr=mean.Tbr,Pbr=mean.Pbr),
                DER_adSurv(aSv0.sp9[u],aS.pr1.sp9[u],aS.pr2.sp9[u],aS.tm1.sp9[u],Twn=mean.Twn,Pwn=mean.Pwn)),2,2)
  lambda_mean_popmodel[u]=lambda(mpm)
}

hist(lambda_mean_popmodel)
mean(lambda_mean_popmodel)
```

## 4) Scaled Sensitivity analyses

Here, we calculate scaled sensitivities, according to Morris et al. 2020 (DOI: <https://doi.org/10.1073/pnas.1918363117>)

Note that this is a step that Esin will implement in her MS thesis. With the information given in 1-3, we should be able to run these analyses. 
### 4.1 Tbr

```{r}
delta.Tbr=NULL
deltaTbr.cov=NULL

# Tbr (breeding temperature)
for(u in 1:100){
  # 1. Sensitivity to Tbr assuming mean covariates
# matrix with max Tbr values
mpm.max=matrix(c(0,DER_juvSurv(jSv0.sp9[u],jS.pr1.sp9[u],jS.pr2.sp9[u],jS.tm1.sp9[u],jS.tm2.sp9[u],Tat=mean.Tat,Pwn=mean.Pwn),
                DER_Fecund(Fec0.sp9[u],Fc.pr1.sp9[u],Fc.pr2.sp9[u],Fc.tm1.sp9[u],Fc.tm2.sp9[u],DDp.sp9[u],Tbr=max.Tbr,Pbr=mean.Pbr), 
                DER_adSurv(aSv0.sp9[u],aS.pr1.sp9[u],aS.pr2.sp9[u],aS.tm1.sp9[u],Twn=mean.Twn,Pwn=mean.Pwn)),2,2)
# matrix with min Tbr values
mpm.min=matrix(c(0,DER_juvSurv(jSv0.sp9[u],jS.pr1.sp9[u],jS.pr2.sp9[u],jS.tm1.sp9[u],jS.tm2.sp9[u],Tat=mean.Tat,Pwn=mean.Pwn),
                DER_Fecund(Fec0.sp9[u],Fc.pr1.sp9[u],Fc.pr2.sp9[u],Fc.tm1.sp9[u],Fc.tm2.sp9[u],DDp.sp9[u],Tbr=min.Tbr,Pbr=mean.Pbr), 
                DER_adSurv(aSv0.sp9[u],aS.pr1.sp9[u],aS.pr2.sp9[u],aS.tm1.sp9[u],Twn=mean.Twn,Pwn=mean.Pwn)),2,2)

# sensitivity to Tbr without covariation
delta.Tbr[u]=abs((lambda(mpm.max)-lambda(mpm.min))/((max.Tbr-min.Tbr)/sd.Tbr))

# 2. Sensitivity to Tbr assuming covariation
# matrix with max values
mpm.max=matrix(c(0,DER_juvSurv(jSv0.sp9[u],jS.pr1.sp9[u],jS.pr2.sp9[u],jS.tm1.sp9[u],jS.tm2.sp9[u],Tat=Tat_when_Tbr_max,Pwn=Pwn_when_Tbr_max),
                DER_Fecund(Fec0.sp9[u],Fc.pr1.sp9[u],Fc.pr2.sp9[u],Fc.tm1.sp9[u],Fc.tm2.sp9[u],DDp.sp9[u],Tbr=max.Tbr,Pbr=Pbr_when_Tbr_max),
                DER_adSurv(aSv0.sp9[u],aS.pr1.sp9[u],aS.pr2.sp9[u],aS.tm1.sp9[u],Twn=Twn_when_Tbr_max,Pwn=Pwn_when_Tbr_max)),2,2)
# matrix with min values
mpm.min=matrix(c(0,DER_juvSurv(jSv0.sp9[u],jS.pr1.sp9[u],jS.pr2.sp9[u],jS.tm1.sp9[u],jS.tm2.sp9[u],Tat=Tat_when_Tbr_min,Pwn=Pwn_when_Tbr_min),
                DER_Fecund(Fec0.sp9[u],Fc.pr1.sp9[u],Fc.pr2.sp9[u],Fc.tm1.sp9[u],Fc.tm2.sp9[u],DDp.sp9[u],Tbr=min.Tbr,Pbr=Pbr_when_Tbr_min),
                DER_adSurv(aSv0.sp9[u],aS.pr1.sp9[u],aS.pr2.sp9[u],aS.tm1.sp9[u],Twn=Twn_when_Tbr_min,Pwn=Pwn_when_Tbr_min)),2,2)

# sensitivity to Tbr with covariation
deltaTbr.cov[u]=abs((lambda(mpm.max)-lambda(mpm.min))/((max.Tbr-min.Tbr)/sd.Tbr))
}

hist(delta.Tbr-deltaTbr.cov) # should be positive, it's not
```

### 4.2 Pwn

```{r}
delta.Pwn=NULL
deltaPwn.cov=NULL

# Pwn (winter precipitation)

mpm.max=matrix(c(0,DER_juvSurv(jSv0.sp9[u],jS.pr1.sp9[u],jS.pr2.sp9[u],jS.tm1.sp9[u],jS.tm2.sp9[u],Tat=mean.Tat,Pwn=max.Pwn),
                DER_Fecund(Fec0.sp9[u],Fc.pr1.sp9[u],Fc.pr2.sp9[u],Fc.tm1.sp9[u],Fc.tm2.sp9[u],DDp.sp9[u],Tbr=mean.Tbr,Pbr=mean.Pbr), 
                DER_adSurv(aSv0.sp9[u],aS.pr1.sp9[u],aS.pr2.sp9[u],aS.tm1.sp9[u],Twn=mean.Twn,Pwn=max.Pwn)),2,2)

mpm.min=matrix(c(0,DER_juvSurv(jSv0.sp9[u],jS.pr1.sp9[u],jS.pr2.sp9[u],jS.tm1.sp9[u],jS.tm2.sp9[u],Tat=mean.Tat,Pwn=min.Pwn),
                DER_Fecund(Fec0.sp9[u],Fc.pr1.sp9[u],Fc.pr2.sp9[u],Fc.tm1.sp9[u],Fc.tm2.sp9[u],DDp.sp9[u],Tbr=mean.Tbr,Pbr=mean.Pbr), 
                DER_adSurv(aSv0.sp9[u],aS.pr1.sp9[u],aS.pr2.sp9[u],aS.tm1.sp9[u],Twn=mean.Twn,Pwn=min.Pwn)),2,2)

delta.Pwn[u]=abs((lambda(mpm.max)-lambda(mpm.min))/((max.Pwn-min.Pwn)/sd.Pwn))

# 2. Sensitivity to Pwn assuming covariation
mpm.max=matrix(c(0,DER_juvSurv(jSv0.sp9[u],jS.pr1.sp9[u],jS.pr2.sp9[u],jS.tm1.sp9[u],jS.tm2.sp9[u],Tat=Tat_when_Pwn_max,Pwn=max.Pwn),
                DER_Fecund(Fec0.sp9[u],Fc.pr1.sp9[u],Fc.pr2.sp9[u],Fc.tm1.sp9[u],Fc.tm2.sp9[u],DDp.sp9[u],Tbr=Tbr_when_Pwn_max,Pbr=Pbr_when_Pwn_max), 
                DER_adSurv(aSv0.sp9[u],aS.pr1.sp9[u],aS.pr2.sp9[u],aS.tm1.sp9[u],Twn=Twn_when_Pwn_max,Pwn=max.Pwn)),2,2)

mpm.min=matrix(c(0,DER_juvSurv(jSv0.sp9[u],jS.pr1.sp9[u],jS.pr2.sp9[u],jS.tm1.sp9[u],jS.tm2.sp9[u],Tat=Tat_when_Pwn_min,Pwn=min.Pwn),
                DER_Fecund(Fec0.sp9[u],Fc.pr1.sp9[u],Fc.pr2.sp9[u],Fc.tm1.sp9[u],Fc.tm2.sp9[u],DDp.sp9[u],Tbr=Tbr_when_Pwn_min,Pbr=Pbr_when_Pwn_min), 
                DER_adSurv(aSv0.sp9[u],aS.pr1.sp9[u],aS.pr2.sp9[u],aS.tm1.sp9[u],Twn=Twn_when_Pwn_min,Pwn=min.Pwn)),2,2)

deltaPwn.cov[u]=abs((lambda(mpm.max)-lambda(mpm.min))/((max.Pwn-min.Pwn)/sd.Pwn))
}

hist(delta.Pwn-deltaPwn.cov)
```

```{r}
mpm.max=matrix(c(0,DER_juvSurv(jSv0.sp9[u],jS.pr1.sp9[u],jS.pr2.sp9[u],jS.tm1.sp9[u],jS.tm2.sp9[u],Tat=Tat_when_Twn_max,Pwn=Pwn_when_Twn_max),
```

```{r}
                DER_adSurv(aSv0.sp9[u],aS.pr1.sp9[u],aS.pr2.sp9[u],aS.tm1.sp9[u],Twn=max.Twn,Pwn=Pwn_when_Twn_max)),2,2)

mpm.min=matrix(c(0,DER_juvSurv(jSv0.sp9[u],jS.pr1.sp9[u],jS.pr2.sp9[u],jS.tm1.sp9[u],jS.tm2.sp9[u],Tat=Tat_when_Twn_min,Pwn=Pwn_when_Twn_min),
                DER_Fecund(Fec0.sp9[u],Fc.pr1.sp9[u],Fc.pr2.sp9[u],Fc.tm1.sp9[u],Fc.tm2.sp9[u],DDp.sp9[u],Tbr=Tbr_when_Twn_min,Pbr=Pbr_when_Twn_min), 
                DER_adSurv(aSv0.sp9[u],aS.pr1.sp9[u],aS.pr2.sp9[u],aS.tm1.sp9[u],Twn=min.Twn,Pwn=Pwn_when_Twn_min)),2,2)

deltaTwn.cov[u]=abs((lambda(mpm.max)-lambda(mpm.min))/((max.Twn-min.Twn)/sd.Twn))
}

hist(delta.Twn-deltaTwn.cov)
```

### 4.5 Tat

```{r}

                DER_Fecund(Fec0.sp9[u],Fc.pr1.sp9[u],Fc.pr2.sp9[u],Fc.tm1.sp9[u],Fc.tm2.sp9[u],DDp.sp9[u],Tbr=mean.Tbr,Pbr=mean.Pbr), 
                DER_adSurv(aSv0.sp9[u],aS.pr1.sp9[u],aS.pr2.sp9[u],aS.tm1.sp9[u],Twn=mean.Twn,Pwn=mean.Pwn)),2,2)

mpm.max=matrix(c(0,DER_juvSurv(jSv0.sp9[u],jS.pr1.sp9[u],jS.pr2.sp9[u],jS.tm1.sp9[u],jS.tm2.sp9[u],Tat=max.Tat,Pwn=Pwn_when_Tat_max),

                DER_adSurv(aSv0.sp9[u],aS.pr1.sp9[u],aS.pr2.sp9[u],aS.tm1.sp9[u],Twn=Twn_when_Tat_max,Pwn=Pwn_when_Tat_max)),2,2)

mpm.min=matrix(c(0,DER_juvSurv(jSv0.sp9[u],jS.pr1.sp9[u],jS.pr2.sp9[u],jS.tm1.sp9[u],jS.tm2.sp9[u],Tat=min.Tat,Pwn=Pwn_when_Tat_min),
                DER_Fecund(Fec0.sp9[u],Fc.pr1.sp9[u],Fc.pr2.sp9[u],Fc.tm1.sp9[u],Fc.tm2.sp9[u],DDp.sp9[u],Tbr=Tbr_when_Tat_min,Pbr=Pbr_when_Tat_min), 
                DER_adSurv(aSv0.sp9[u],aS.pr1.sp9[u],aS.pr2.sp9[u],aS.tm1.sp9[u],Twn=Twn_when_Tat_min,Pwn=Pwn_when_Tat_min)),2,2)

deltaTat.cov[u]=abs((lambda(mpm.max)-lambda(mpm.min))/((max.Tat-min.Tat)/sd.Tat))
}

hist(delta.Tat-deltaTat.cov)
```

## 5) Scaled sensitivity analyses per vr

where you perturb (considering covariation) each vital rate separately. Say, you have juvenile and adult survival; then you calculate scaled sensitivity perturbing juvenile survival (max, min) only, leaving the effect of the drivers at their mean for adult survival; and do the same for adult survival, leaving the effect of drivers at their mean for juvenile survival.

### 5.1) Tbr

```{r}
# 1. Sensitivity to Tbr (breeding temperature) assuming covariation
# FECUNDITY
deltaTbr.Fec=NULL
for(u in 1:100){
  mpm.max=matrix(c(0,DER_juvSurv(jSv0.sp9[u],jS.pr1.sp9[u],jS.pr2.sp9[u],jS.tm1.sp9[u],jS.tm2.sp9[u],Tat=mean.Tat,Pwn=mean.Pwn),
                DER_Fecund(Fec0.sp9[u],Fc.pr1.sp9[u],Fc.pr2.sp9[u],Fc.tm1.sp9[u],Fc.tm2.sp9[u],DDp.sp9[u],Tbr=max.Tbr,Pbr=Pbr_when_Tbr_max),
                DER_adSurv(aSv0.sp9[u],aS.pr1.sp9[u],aS.pr2.sp9[u],aS.tm1.sp9[u],Twn=mean.Twn,Pwn=mean.Pwn)),2,2)

mpm.min=matrix(c(0,DER_juvSurv(jSv0.sp9[u],jS.pr1.sp9[u],jS.pr2.sp9[u],jS.tm1.sp9[u],jS.tm2.sp9[u],Tat=mean.Tat,Pwn=mean.Pwn),
                DER_Fecund(Fec0.sp9[u],Fc.pr1.sp9[u],Fc.pr2.sp9[u],Fc.tm1.sp9[u],Fc.tm2.sp9[u],DDp.sp9[u],Tbr=min.Tbr,Pbr=Pbr_when_Tbr_min),
                DER_adSurv(aSv0.sp9[u],aS.pr1.sp9[u],aS.pr2.sp9[u],aS.tm1.sp9[u],Twn=mean.Twn,Pwn=mean.Pwn)),2,2)

deltaTbr.Fec[u]=abs((lambda(mpm.max)-lambda(mpm.min))/((max.Tbr-min.Tbr)/sd.Tbr))
  
}

# JUVENILE SURVIVAL
# no Tbr in juvenile surv

# ADULT SURVIVAL
# no Tbr in adult surv
```

```{r}
                DER_adSurv(aSv0.sp9[u],aS.pr1.sp9[u],aS.pr2.sp9[u],aS.tm1.sp9[u],Twn=Twn_when_Pwn_min,Pwn=min.Pwn)),2,2)
```

## 6) Save output

```{r}
# no cov vs with cov
ScaledSens=data.frame(study.doi="https://doi.org/10.1098/rstb.2022.0194",
                      year.of.publication="2023",
                      group="Birds",
                      species="Turdus torquatus",
                      continent="Europe",
                      driver=rep(c("Tbr","Tat","Twn","Pbr","Pwn"),each=100),
                      driver.type="C",
                      stage.age="all",
                      vital.rates="all",
                      sens.no.cov=c(delta.Tbr,delta.Tat,delta.Twn,delta.Pbr,delta.Pwn),
                      sens.cov=c(deltaTbr.cov,deltaTat.cov,deltaTwn.cov,deltaPbr.cov,deltaPwn.cov))

write.csv(ScaledSens,"Output/Turdus_Sens.csv",row.names = F)

# per vr
ScaledSensVR=data.frame(study.doi="https://doi.org/10.1098/rstb.2022.0194",
                        year.of.publication="2023",
                        group="Birds",
                        species="Turdus torquatus",
                        continent="Europe",
                        driver=rep(c("Tbr","Pbr","Pwn","Pwn","Tat","Twn"),each=100),
                        driver.type="C",
                        stage.age=rep(c("adult","adult","juvenile","adult","juvenile","adult"),each=100),
                        vital.rates=rep(c("fecundity","fecundity","survival","survival","survival","survival")),
                        sens=c(deltaTbr.Fec,deltaPbr.Fec,deltaPwn.JSuv,deltaPwn.ASuv,deltaTat.JSurv,deltaTwn.ASurv))
write.csv(ScaledSensVR,"Output/Turdus_Sens_per_VR.csv",row.names = F)
```
